scripts.ci:bundles: npm run ci:core:bundles:utils && npm run ci:core:bundles:zip && npm run ci:test:bundles:expect && npm run ci:bundles:fs && npm run ci:bundles:pngjs
scripts.build: npm run generate-injected:core && npm run ci:bundles && npm run build:bundles && npm run build:injected && npm run build:types && npx vite build
scripts.test:deploy: npm run test:generate:worker && npm run ci:tests && cd tests && npx wrangler deploy
scripts.test:dev: npm run test:generate:worker && cd tests && npx wrangler dev --remote
scripts.test:full: npm run test:generate:proxy && cd tests && npx playwright test
scripts.test:smoke: npm run test:generate:proxy && cd tests && npx playwright test --grep "@smoke"
scripts.test:merge: cd tests && npx playwright merge-reports --reporter html ./all-blob-reports
